name: Cheeze and the Chicken Nugget! (Demo)
description:
Nugget thanks you for playing!!

Plot: After some sneaky shenanigans, you fall into Tutorial Tunnel, and need to make your way out! On your way, you will encounter some wacky foes and will have to face them in battle!

by iamcheeze: https://iamcheeze.itch.io/

Music by:

  - TheMidiMan: https://twitter.com/TheMIDIMan1

  - and the Imovie Sound Library
